tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE satellite_imagery (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    capture_date DATE,
    image_url TEXT,
    sensor_type TEXT,
    resolution FLOAT,
    city_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE urban_sprawl_monitoring (
    monitoring_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id UUID,
    monitoring_date DATE,
    monitoring_result JSONB,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES satellite_imagery(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE image_metadata (
    metadata_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    capture_time TIME,
    image_quality VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES satellite_images(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Locations (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 location_name TEXT NOT NULL,
 latitude DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
 longitude DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
 elevation DOUBLE PRECISION
);

CREATE TABLE ImageData (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 image_id INTEGER REFERENCES SatelliteImages(id),
 satellite_id INTEGER REFERENCES Satellites(id),
 location_id INTEGER REFERENCES Locations(id),
 image_data BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_images (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_url TEXT,
    capture_date DATE,
    location TEXT,
    resolution TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE image_metadata (
    metadata_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    satellite_name TEXT,
    sensor_type TEXT,
    cloud_coverage FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES satellite_images(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE image_annotations (
    annotation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    annotation_content TEXT,
    reviewed_by TEXT,
    review_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES satellite_images(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE image_labels (
    label_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    label_name TEXT,
    confidence_level FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES satellite_images(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE image_analysis_results (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_results JSON,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES satellite_images(image_id)
);
